name: Other financial intermediaries, except insurance corporations and pension funds, other than CCPs, FVCs, security and derivative dealers, financial corporations engaged in lending and specialised financial corporations
description: It corresponds to subsector S.125, as defined in Regulation (EU) No 549/2013 (paragraphs 2.86 to 2.94 of Annex A), extended to the rest of the world, other than CCPs, as defined in point (1) of Article 2 of Regulation (EU) No 648/2012, FVCs, as defined in Article 1 of Regulation (EU) No 1075/2013, and security and derivative dealers, financial corporations engaged in lending and specialised financial corporations, as defined in Regulation (EU) No 549/2013 (paragraphs 2.91, 2.92 and 2.93, respectively, of Annex A), extended to the rest of the world.
